sentences.en: Belief of their own pagan, is the only non - Christians after Constantine emperor.
sentences.cn: 其本人信奉异教, 是君士坦丁之后唯一的 非 基督教徒帝王.

sentences.en: Certainly there seemed little harmony between this pagan literature and the medieval colleges at Christminster.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,在这种异教文学和基督寺那些中古学院之间,很少协调.

sentences.en: City tip: The Keepers leave glyph markings outside Hammer and Pagan territory.
sentences.cn: 城市提示: 守卫者在圣锤教和异教徒的领地外留了象形文字记号.

sentences.en: First, British and French clerics demonised Russian Orthodoxy as a semi - pagan creed.
sentences.cn: 首先, 英法两国教士将俄国东正教妖魔化为一种半异教信条.

sentences.en: In Germany, people honored pagan god Oden during the mid - winter holiday.
sentences.cn: 在德国, 中冬时节人们尊崇非基督教神奥登.

sentences.en: Much of this tradition derives from the pagan festival of Beltane.
sentences.cn: 这个传统更多地来源于异教节日——五朔节.
这是名符其实的异教宿命论.

sentences.en: That pagan did not believe in Christ.
sentences.cn: 那个异教徒从不相信基督。

sentences.en: The ecclesiastical purple and the pagan orange symbolising the symbiosis in marriage.
sentences.cn: 教会的紫色和异教的橙色,多么奇怪的共生现象.

sentences.en: The new religion was eager to convert the pagan world.
sentences.cn: 那种新宗教急于使异教徒皈依本教。

sentences.en: The pagans used torchlight parades and bonfires to celebrate important events.
sentences.cn: 异教徒们用火把游行和篝火来庆祝重大的事件。

sentences.en: The priest grafted pagan rites upon Christian usage.
sentences.cn: 这个牧师把异教徒的仪式融合于基督教惯例中.

sentences.en: The result is that we have adopted a pagan view to sex.
sentences.cn: 结果是﹐我们对性的观念多是世俗的﹐异教的.

sentences.en: The singing of Christmas carols is a custom derived from early dance routines of pagan origin.
sentences.cn: 唱圣诞颂歌的风俗源自异教徒早期的舞蹈仪式。

sentences.en: The word Easter derives from Eostre, the pagan goddess of spring.
sentences.cn: Easter（复活节）一词由Eostre（多神教的春天女神）衍生而来。

sentences.en: Tip: The Pagan tribes are populated by both humans and beastmen.
sentences.cn: 提示: 异教徒派别由人类和兽人组成.

trans.tran_en: pagan religious beliefs and customs do not belong to any of the main religions of the world, and may come from a time before these religions

trans.tran_cn: 异教徒，非基督教徒，没有宗教信仰的人
trans.tran_en: someone who believes in a pagan religion
